code:
%%{Security_IntrusionDetection}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-03.01 — Proposal Lifecycle (Security_Encryption)

[Security_Firewall] --> DRAFT : ProposalCreated (Security_ZeroTrust)
note right of DRAFT
  Authoring & validation:
  • proposalId assigned
  • schema/policy checks
end note

DRAFT --> REVIEW : SubmittedForReview
note right of REVIEW
  Guard reviews (Security_IntrusionDetection)
  Can request changes or reject
end note

REVIEW --> DRAFT : ChangesRequested
REVIEW --> REJECTED : RejectedAtReview
REVIEW --> OPEN_FOR_VOTE : ApprovedForVoting (Security_Encryption)

OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> OPEN_FOR_VOTE : VoteCast (Security_IntrusionDetection)
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> TALLYING : VotingClosed

TALLYING --> DECIDED_APPROVED : VoteTallied → Approved (Security_OAuth2)
TALLYING --> DECIDED_REJECTED : VoteTallied → Rejected (Security_ZeroTrust)

DECIDED_APPROVED --> EXECUTION : DecisionRecorded (Security_ZeroTrust)
DECIDED_REJECTED --> ARCHIVED : DecisionRecorded (Security_Encryption)

EXECUTION --> EXECUTED : PolicyChanged / GrantApproved / ProjectApproved (Security_Firewall)
EXECUTION --> EXECUTION_FAILED : ExecutionFailed

EXECUTION_FAILED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (Security_OAuth2)
EXECUTION_FAILED --> RETRY_EXEC : RetryAuthorized
RETRY_EXEC --> EXECUTION : ReExecute

EXECUTED --> AUDIT : ExecutionCompleted
AUDIT --> ARCHIVED : AuditLogged (Security_IntrusionDetection)

%% Appeals (Security_IntrusionDetection)
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (Security_Firewall)
DECIDED_APPROVED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (Security_OAuth2)
DECIDED_REJECTED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (Security_ZeroTrust)

APPEAL --> DECIDED_APPROVED : AppealResolved → uphold
APPEAL --> DECIDED_REJECTED : AppealResolved → overturn
APPEAL --> ARCHIVED : AppealWithdrawn

%% Cancellations
DRAFT --> CANCELLED : WithdrawnByAuthor
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> CANCELLED : CancelledByAuthority
CANCELLED --> ARCHIVED : Archived

%% Terminal states
REJECTED --> [Security_Firewall]
ARCHIVED --> [Security_Encryption]

%% ===== Styling =====
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class DRAFT,REVIEW,OPEN_FOR_VOTE,TALLYING,DECIDED_APPROVED,DECIDED_REJECTED,EXECUTION,EXECUTED,EXECUTION_FAILED,RETRY_EXEC,APPEAL,AUDIT,ARCHIVED,REJECTED,CANCELLED core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 Security_Encryption 和 Security_ZeroTrust 这一块。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Security_Encryption 和 Security_ZeroTrust'？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 Security_IntrusionDetection 和 Security_Encryption 这一块。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Security_IntrusionDetection 和 Security_Encryption'，对吧？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Security_IntrusionDetection 和 Security_OAuth2。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Security_IntrusionDetection 和 Security_OAuth2'，你看看合适吗？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Security_ZeroTrust 和 Security_ZeroTrust。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Security_ZeroTrust 和 Security_ZeroTrust'？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Security_Encryption 和 Security_Firewall。
不，其实叫 Security_Encryption处理 会更准确一点。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Security_Encryption处理'，你看看合适吗？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 Security_OAuth2 和 Security_IntrusionDetection 的环节。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Security_OAuth2 和 Security_IntrusionDetection'，你看看合适吗？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 Security_IntrusionDetection 和 Security_Firewall 的逻辑。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Security_IntrusionDetection 和 Security_Firewall'，你看看合适吗？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 Security_OAuth2 和 Security_ZeroTrust 的分支。
不，其实叫 Security_OAuth2处理 会更准确一点。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Security_OAuth2处理'，对吧？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
